channel.title: Requesting assistance

item.title: Requesting assistance
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

[code]program New;

var
x, y: Integer;

begin
repeat
MoveMouse(41, 276);
wait(2000);
ClickMouse(41, 276, True);
wait(2000);
MoveMouse(512, 482);
wait(2000);
ClickMouse(512, 482, True);
wait(2000);
if(findcolor(x,y,49152,922,282,923,284)) then
begin
Sendkeys(‘a’);
wait(300);
end;
if(findcolor(x,y,16711680,921,281,922,282)) then
begin
Sendkeys(‘s’);
wait(300);
end;
if(findcolor(x,y,16776960,922,282,923,284)) then
begin
Sendkeys(‘d’);
wait(300);
end;
if(findcolor(x,y,621239,662,560,664,564)) then
begin
Sendkeys(‘f’);
wait(1000);
end;
until(IsFKeyDown(2)); //Will stop when you hold down F2 for a bit, It’s a good idea not to use false, incase you need to stop it
end.[/code]

Is that what you meant?

Read full topic

item.title: Requesting assistance
item.dc:creator: @Darando Darando
item.description:
@Darando wrote:

I was wondering if anyone could help me with this script.
Fixed the script, but I have two more problem’s.
How can i make this script start from ‘begin’? would i use a Goto like the one commented? how would i do it?
Also, how can I make the wait’s exclusive to the if statement their inside of?

var
x, y: Integer;
begin
MoveMouse(41, 276);
wait(2000)
ClickMouse(41, 276, True);
wait(2000)
MoveMouse(512, 482);
wait(2000)
ClickMouse(512, 482, True);
wait(2000)
repeat
if(findcolor(x,y,49152,922,282,923,284)) then
Sendkeys(‘a’);
wait(300);
if(findcolor(x,y,16711680,921,281,922,282)) then
Sendkeys(‘s’);
wait(300);
if(findcolor(x,y,16776960,922,282,923,284)) then
Sendkeys(‘d’);
wait(300);
if(findcolor(x,y,621239,662,560,664,564)) then
Sendkeys(‘f’);
wait(1000);
//goto start
until(false)
end.

Read full topic
